entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,519Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 47

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcases in the living room. Beside the photo, in thick marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back out of pure spite. But in the corner, tiny letters catch his eye: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does.The next page has the present date scribbled in the corner and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone.I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest.Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf.We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. Derek runs a thumb over it in disbelief.---What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: My Name is Derek Hale [comic]
entry.summary:
Author: Melioristicbeast

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 0Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 153

Summary: From the original fic this comic is an adaptation of:“What day is it?” Derek demanded.“What?”“The day! What day is today?!” Derek let Stiles go, but only so he could reach into his pocket and pull out his phone. He tapped at the home screen, and then went so perfectly still that Stiles was pretty sure this guy wasn’t human. No human could stand that still.When it was clear Derek wasn’t going to move again without some prompting, Stiles said, “It’s Wednesday.”“That’s impossible,” Derek whispered.“Not really, it comes around every seven days.”“This is impossible,” Derek said again, looking around himself, as if he was searching for something.

entry.title: The Scent of Love (Original)
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,759Chapters: 10/16Kudos: 33

Summary: Sheriff Stilinski decides to sent Stiles on a months long overseas trip. Because his son definitely needs a vacation and a little time out from Beacon Hills.Thanks to Derek, who lives in Venice, Italy, he also has a place to stay.Reluctantly, Stiles agrees to fly to Europe and encounters a somewhat changed Derek Hale.As they share an apartment, they begin to redefine their uneasy friendship and learn to trust each other.With lots of fun and flirty banter, both guys eventually get to know a whole new world of heartbreak, sex and true connection.(note to previous readers: I've changed and added a lot of dialogues, rewrite the sex scenes and the ending of the story will be different than in the first version from 2022/23.)

entry.title: For the Moon Goddess
entry.summary:
Author: ProLuna

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,890Chapters: 7/42Kudos: 13

Summary: Stiles is a new novice at the Beacon Hills Temple of the Moon Goddess, where the priests have forsworn all women and have ritual sex to make seminal offerings to their deity. In an AU where a moon cult is the dominant religion in an alternate fantasy-type world, Stiles navigates friendship, love, and a confusing priesthood that has way too many rules about sex for basically being Sex University.A lot of other pairings along the way, but from the beginning, this story is about how we get to Sterek.

entry.title: The Recipe for Life
entry.summary:
Author: PeterChristensen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,194Chapters: 11/12Kudos: 65

Summary: Stiles is the engine that runs Doughboy, the chaotic little bakery he built from his late mother’s treasured recipes, but the stress of keeping her memory alive, 16-hour days, 6 days a week, has started to take its toll. To make matters worse, when the town's Chamber of Commerce pressures him into a cooking competition for their latest viral marketing stunt, he’s partnered with the last person he’d ever choose. Derek Hale, the world-traveled trust-fund baby and brooding Gordan Ramsey wannabe.Derek, a professional chef who's still struggling with the recent passing of his sister, is the last living Hale to uphold a world-class culinary legacy. While returning to Beacon Hills, his childhood hometown, he opens his flagship restaurant, Hales, as an honor to the memory of his late family. But now he's stuck with Stiles Stilinski, the hot mess from the Doughboy bakery, who's stuck in the past and refuses to join the present, as a partner in a viral cooking competition that could make or break his new restaurant's success.Sparks fly as flour meets foie gras, and their rivalry in the culinary scene threatens to ignite into something far messier, and far more irresistible, than either expected.

entry.title: Golden Egg
entry.summary:
Author: Asteria_Star

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,903Chapters: 8/8Kudos: 47

Summary: It’s dangerous. You never know what will happen. Those were the words his mom told him when he asked what happens if his golden egg happens to be a living being. If anything ever happened to them, it would break you.Hell, her golden egg wasn’t living and someone broke in and robbed their home, finding it and taking it. Them not being able to find it led to her death, it still haunted him to this day. He didn’t want a golden egg, quite content to just have his little trinkets and such. Not every dragon or dragonkin had a golden egg, so he was fine.Until some gorgeous prick looked at him and Scott and told them it was private property.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 173,580Chapters: 20/40Kudos: 504

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.summary:
Author: SpaceflowerGrace

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,341Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 37

Summary: They didn't talk much about why Stiles was back in town.His mother had been inordinately proud of that fact she went into labor and delivered Stiles alone in the woods. It was the eighties, she couldn’t exactly call her husband on her cell phone. Stiles was born healthy in the preserve.Scott got hurt. Scott is Stiles to protect. He always has been. Stiles is pissed about quite a few things. “Scott is my fifteen year old cousin! And you hurt him and then left him alone and hurt? What’s wrong with you?” He has gotten very close to Derek’s face. Stiles takes a breath and turns away.Or- what if Stiles was the responsible adult at home?

entry.title: Rule Number One: Don't Fall in Love With Your Best Friend's Brother
entry.summary:
Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,866Chapters: 16/30Kudos: 390

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating. No. No, Stiles definitely doesn't think about his best friend's older brother like that.What happens when the opportunity to confront his totally-not-a-crush appears: the Beacon Hills high school's Valentine's Day fundraiser.Also known as 50/50 slice of life/teen wolf drama with a hearty dose of the Hales being a close knit family

entry.title: LIKE THE COMING OF SPRING
entry.summary:
Author: TheSaintRyan

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,941Chapters: 28/36Kudos: 2

Summary: Three months after leaving to attend Berkeley, Stiles receives a phone call. Twelve years later; Stiles and Derek's son, Eli, is eager to help when a new enemy emerges. The nemeton has been quieted, but things never remain silent forever. When a demonic force threatens the peace in Beacon Hills, the Hale pack must prove that they are stronger than ever.Or;You are in the backyard, lying in the grass. The sun is high and hot. The light is painting the darkness behind your eyes into a vermillion. “You know what you have to do, right?” Laura asks. Last you saw she was filling a wading pool, but the water has stopped running through the hose and as she moves you can hear it sloshing around her shins.“No clue,” you answer. Laura laughs. You've missed that sound so much, and it makes you think about how long it took you after your family died to laugh again. “Last time we spoke you said my grief was too quiet… but it's been a while since I lost anyone.”You hear the water slosh two more times as she steps out of the pool. She walks over to you and stands so close to your arm that you can feel how cold the water is from her feet.“Who says grief must be fresh to be felt?”

entry.title: Something Like Gravity
entry.summary:
Author: UrNewtmas_ObsessedGirl

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,592Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 43

Summary: They weren’t friends. Not really.But when Stiles is nearly killed during a pack mission, it’s Derek who stays by his side — silent, steady, and unexpectedly gentle. Over the course of a year, a cautious friendship forms between them, shifting slowly into something deeper and far more complicated.Stiles doesn't understand why Derek keeps protecting him like he matters. Derek doesn't understand why it’s getting harder to hide what Stiles is to him.When the truth finally comes out — that Stiles is Derek’s mate — it changes everything. Now Stiles has to confront what that means… and whether he wants to be someone who stays.A slow-burn canonverse Sterek fic full of emotional buildup, soft bonding moments, awkward conversations, protective instincts, and the kind of love that sneaks up on you — quiet and inevitable, like gravity.

entry.title: Full of your love
entry.summary:
Author: ColdHeartedBitch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,910Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 46

Summary: It's Stiles who brings it up. It's been three years since they got together, two years since Stiles’ turned eighteen and they've moved together in the newly rebuilt Hale house, six months since Derek proposed. Three beautiful years. Their pack is strong, comfortable. Derek grew into his Alpha status and with time became less harsh, less angry at the world.With the Beacon Hills being so peaceful for some time already, them happy and comfortable, Stiles started to think about their family. About bringing cubs into their life. Yes, he is young, he still has college to finish. But he's sure he wants kids with Derek. And he knows that he has nothing to be afraid of. He will have help, he won't be alone. Derek, his dad and Melissa, their pack.
